name: PHANTOM GUN
description:
In a world where creatures are appearing and atacking people, a new organization has been created to eliminate them!

Game made for Devtalk Game Jam

Theme: Purity

Diversifiers: Boss

Hindering: No fire guns; 

                    No mothers.

*English Translation coming soon

CONTROLS:                         MOVEMOUSE:  Aim

LEFT BUTTON: Absorb / Interact

RIGHT BUTTON: Shoot

MIDDLE BUTTON: Change Item MiranhaS2 · Phantom Gun [OST] DEVELOPED BY:
